body:
i’m thankful to have had my favorite meal yesterday, a table covered in newspaper covered in blue crabs steamed red covered in old bay.

i’m thankful that i love my parents and that they love me, but i’m also thankful that our visit is over and d and i are at the airport waiting for the shuttle that will take us home. 

i’m thankful that this is the first week of real fall and that i will get to rake the leaves for the first time tomorrow.
normalized_markdown:
i’m thankful to have had my favorite meal yesterday, a table covered in newspaper covered in blue crabs steamed red covered in old bay.

i’m thankful that i love my parents and that they love me, but i’m also thankful that our visit is over and d and i are at the airport waiting for the shuttle that will take us home. 

i’m thankful that this is the first week of real fall and that i will get to rake the leaves for the first time tomorrow.
